name: Puma
label: Puma
shortDescription: Puma (Penalized Unified Multiple-locus Association) is a penalized maximum likelihood regression method.
longDescription: Puma comprises a family of statistical methods designed to identify weak associations in genome-wide association studies that are not detectable by conventional statistical methods. Puma uses a regularized multiple regression in a penalized maximum likelihood framework using a generalized linear model in order to simultaneously consider tens to hundreds of thousands of genetic markers in a single statistical model.

details.label: Genotype TPED
details.description: Puma takes genotypes in the widely used TPED format of Plink and genotypes must be coded as 1 or 2. Convert a Plink genotype file to this format using options: --transpose --recode12

details.label: Phenotype TFAM
details.description: Phenotype data and sex data are read from TFAM files generated with Plink options

details.label: Covariate TXT
details.description: Covariates are stored in a text file where each row is an individual and each space-delimited column is a covariate. A mean term is included by default.

details.label: Sex Covariate
details.description: If --tfam is used, this includes sex as a covariate.

details.label: Regression Model
details.description: Specify regression model as either LINEAR or LOGISTIC.

details.label: Single Marker Analysis
details.description: If set, performs only standard single marker analysis.

details.label: Penalty Methods to Run
details.description: Space delimited list of methods to run, select from: LASSO ALASSO LOG NEG MCP VBAY.

details.label: Name for Results
details.description: Name to be appended to results files.

details.label: Screen P Value
details.description: Marginal p-values below which markers are passed to method.

details.label: Results Folder
details.description: Specify folder where results are saved. Defaults to local folder.

details.label: Number of threads
details.description: Number of threads used to run in parallel. Defaults to machine default.

details.label: Restricted path search
details.description: 1 dimensional path search for non-convex penalties.
